email_chain.subject: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Shanghai to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

I hope this email finds you well. We have a spot enquiry for 12,000 MT of steel coils from Shanghai to Los Angeles under FOB terms. Our initial freight offer is USD 45.50 per MT.

Vessel: OCEAN BREEZE
DWT: 75,000
LOA: 250m
Laycan: 20-25 Oct 2023

Please let me know your thoughts.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Maritime Traders

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Shanghai to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the offer. USD 45.50 seems a bit high compared to current market rates. Could you consider lowering the rate to USD 42.00 per MT? Also, what is the demurrage rate per day?

Best,
Sophia Nguyen
Cargo Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Shanghai to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

Thank you for your response. I can lower the rate to USD 43.50 per MT, considering our long-standing relationship. The demurrage rate is USD 10,000 per day, pro rata.

Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Shanghai to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Lucas,

USD 43.50 is still a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you stretch the laycan to 22-27 Oct? If so, we could agree to USD 42.75 per MT.

Best,
Sophia

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Shanghai to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

I can agree to USD 42.75 per MT with the revised laycan of 22-27 Oct. Please confirm if this works for you, and I will send over the recap.

Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Steel Coils - Shanghai to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Lucas,

USD 42.75 works for us. Please send the recap.

Best,
Sophia

email_chain.subject: Confirmed: Steel Coils - Shanghai to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

Great! Recap attached. Thank you for the business.

Commodity: Steel Coils
Quantity: 12,000 MT
Load Port: Shanghai
Discharge Port: Los Angeles
Incoterms: FOB
Vessel: OCEAN BREEZE
Freight: USD 42.75/MT
Laycan: 22-27 Oct 2023
Demurrage: USD 10,000/day pro rata.

Best regards,
Lucas
